name: Pawn Battle
description:
♟About Pawn Battle♟

Pawn Battle is a chess variant in which you control only pawns. Game ends when a pawn is captured. There are 3 AI difficulty settings.

♟Source Code♟

You can see the game's source code at https://github.com/Gord10/PawnBattle

♟Use Of Limitation♟

Pawns (and players) die at the first capture.

♟Input♟

Play with Mouse

♟Credits♟

Programming & Design: Ahmet Kamil Keles

2D Art:  HowToGameDev

Music: Cemre Uyanik

♟Follow For More♟
